Address.value: 3730 KIRBY DRIVE RIVER OAKS TOWER, SUITE 1200, HOUSTON, Texas, 77098, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Aravive Inc is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company. It focuses on developing treatments designed to halt the progression of life-threatening diseases, including cancer and fibrosis. Aravive's lead candidate is batiraxcept, which is is an ultrahigh-affinity, decoy protein that targets the GAS6-AXL signaling pathway.
